item.title: Blockchain Bitcoin
item.description: LINK: How Bitcoin Works Under the Hood What is Bitcoin? At its core, Bitcoin is just a digital file that lists accounts and money like a ledger. A copy of this file is maintained on every computer in the Bitcoin network. (update: you don’t have to maintain a ledger just to use Bitcoin to send and receive money, this is for people who want to help maintain the system). These numbers donâ€™t represent anything in the physical world, they only have value because people are willing to trade real goods and services for a higher number next to their account, and believe that others will do the same.
